name: A Journey Home
description:
(Download Windows Version Below)

Farming/Exploring Game

Controls:

WASD - Move around

E - Pick up/Interact

Spacebar - use Staff

A Journey Home

You play as Jake, a pumpkin brought to life with the goal of restoring the village to its original beauty.

Pick up fallen leaves to upgrade your campsite, fight spiders in the Northern forest, and help villagers rebuild their homes within 30 days.

Team:

Milo_Munemoto

MsAirrie

Daniel_idac

SHLEO

This game is definitely unfinished, since other team members didn't end up having much time, i tried to make a playable version on my own in the time i had.

(not a programmer) :D
